REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f2503 reute r f BC-MORRISON-<MORR>-SETS 03-30 0055

TEXT.TITLE: MORRISON <MORR> SETS SHAREHOLDER RIGHTS PLAN
TEXT.BODY: Morrison Inc said its board adopted a shareholder rights plan to deter any possible hostile takeover of the company. It said details of the plan will be released shortly. A record date of April 10 was set for the distribution of the rights to shareholders. Reuter
